name: kriit
description: Viljandi Kutseõppekeskuse kodutööde ja hinnete haldamise rakendus

scripts.restart: bun run stop && bun run start
scripts.composer: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec app composer
scripts.db:import: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec app php scripts/refreshdb.php --restore
scripts.db:export: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec app php scripts/refreshdb.php --dump
scripts.refreshdb: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml exec app php refreshdb.php
scripts.checksums:reset: rm -f .docker-checksums.json && echo 'Docker checksums reset. Next start will rebuild all images.'
